full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THUN MONG GI DON MTHAR PHYIN PA'I SMON LAM BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA THUN MONG PA'I DON MTHAR PHYIN PA'I SMON LAM ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD LDAN SLOB BU RAB DKAR LHA RDZAS DAD LDAN BCAS PAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DGE SLONG RDO RJE RIG 'DZIN RTZAL GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,DGE BA 'DIS BSTAN PA PHYOGS BCUR DAD PA DANG 'GRO BA KUN LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
